overview:
Steve is a Software Developer with Vancouver’s OpenRoad, and is currently one of the key developer’s in their social intranet product, ThoughtFarmer.

Steve is an expert in Microsoft’s .NET framework, specializing in architecting and implementing solutions in the C# language. He possesses a high degree of skill in object oriented programming, and has a deep understanding of solid coding practices.

In addition to the above, he is an expert in front end coding, including technologies such as CSS, XHTML, and most importantly, JavaScript. He has used a diverse range of client side libraries, such as mootools, YUI, prototype, and jQuery.

Steve graduated with honors from the British Columbia Institute of Technology in 2005 with a diploma of technology in Information Systems.
